entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is introduced as a person who yells 'Team! Bed!' to wake up Harry. ("It came as a relief when Wood suddenly stood up and yelled, ‘Team! Bed!’")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the person who has bad dreams about oversleeping and forgetting his Firebolt. ("Harry slept badly.")

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned in Harry's dream as a substitute for him. ("We had to use Neville instead!")

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is introduced as the Slytherin team member who arrives on a dragon. ("Then he dreamed that Malfoy and the rest of the Slytherin team arrived for the match riding dragons.")

entities.name: slytherin team
entities.description: The Slytherin team is introduced as a group of students who arrive on dragons. ("Then he dreamed that Malfoy and the rest of the Slytherin team arrived for the match riding dragons.")

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is introduced as Harry's broomstick that he forgets in his dream. ("He was flying at breakneck speed, trying to avoid a spurt of flames from Malfoy’s steed’s mouth, when he realized he had forgotten his Firebolt.")

entities.name: bed
entities.description: The bed is introduced as the place where Harry sleeps. ("It was a few seconds before Harry remembered that the match hadn’t taken place yet, that he was safe in bed,")

relationships.description: Wood wakes up Harry by yelling 'Team! Bed!' ("It came as a relief when Wood suddenly stood up and yelled, ‘Team! Bed!’")
Malfoy is a member of the Slytherin team. ("Then he dreamed that Malfoy and the rest of the Slytherin team arrived for the match riding dragons.")
Harry owns the Firebolt broomstick. ("He was flying at breakneck speed, trying to avoid a spurt of flames from Malfoy’s steed’s mouth, when he realized he had forgotten his Firebolt.")
Harry sleeps in the bed. ("It was a few seconds before Harry remembered that the match hadn’t taken place yet, that he was safe in bed,")
